article_metadata.news-keywords: dhhs, medicaid, cfo, audit, mental health, taxpayers, tax money, kickbacks, eastpointe, healthcare
article_metadata.description: A former money manager with a regional mental health agency took nearly $550,000 in apparent kickbacks from two contractors who were paid about $1 million to renovate agency buildings, according to a state audit released Tuesday.
article_metadata.title: Former regional mental health CFO took $550,000 in apparent kickbacks, says state audit | The Charlotte Observer

og.description: A former money manager with a regional mental health agency took nearly $550,000 in apparent kickbacks from two contractors who were paid about $1 million to renovate agency buildings, according to a state audit released Tuesday.
og.title: Former regional mental health CFO took $550,000 in apparent kickbacks, says state audit
